# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the word embedding parameters.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing parameters

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the word embedding parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the word embedding parameters shown in a playground.
